text: Warning : This article contains spoilers from Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt season 3 episode 5. Read at your own risk. The fifth episode of Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt ‘ s third season ended with a surprising twist : an Orange Is the New Black crossover. In “ Kimmy Steps on a Crack!, ” the FBI asks Kimmy ( Ellie Kemper ) to help them diffuse a situation involving her former bunker - mate Gretchen ( Lauren Adams ), who started a cult comprised of kidnapped young boys and who is now threatening to blow up the cult ’ s compound. Kimmy ’ s able to talk Gretchen down, and she convinces her to accept the consequences of her actions by going to prison. And not just any prison!
